body:
I hope this isn't spam but who here has connection issues with the server.

Where you can login into the server but a few seconds later you'll crash?
Is anyone else having this issue?
body_tagged:
I hope this isn't spam but who here has connection issues with the server.

Where you can login into the server but a few seconds later you'll crash?

title: Connection Issues

replies.body: Yes it has happened a lot lately.
replies.body_tagged: Yes it has happened a lot lately.

replies.body: I've been having this on a lot of servers recently, I randomly crash after 30 seconds-2 minutes. It only happens sometimes though, there are times when I can play normally
replies.body_tagged: I've been having this on a lot of servers recently, I randomly crash after 30 seconds-2 minutes. It only happens sometimes though, there are times when I can play normally

replies.body: Some servers I can connect to but however this one just makes me crash as I'm only in the hub for 30 seconds.
